Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 33 Random terpolymers comprised of thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione , thiophene( T ) , and dithiophene ( 2T ) were synthesized by Yang and co-workers in which the crystallinity of terpolymers could be controlled by varying the compositions of T and 2T.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [3,4-g]-thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione |
| thiophene(T) |
| dithiophene (2T) |

The other entities such as "33 Random terpolymers" and "Yang and co-workers" are not material names, but rather describe the synthesis process and the researchers involved.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 33 Random terpolymers comprised of thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione , thiophene( T ) , and dithiophene ( 2T ) were synthesized by Yang and co-workers in which the crystallinity of terpolymers could be controlled by varying the compositions of T and 2T.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| crystallinity |
| compositions of T and 2T |

Explanation:

The "Property Name" entities refer to the characteristics or attributes that are being described or measured in the paragraph. In this case, the property names are "crystallinity" and "compositions of T and 2T".

"Crystallinity" is a property that describes the degree of structural order in a material. Here, it is being controlled by varying the compositions of T and 2T.

"Compositions of T and 2T" refer to the relative amounts of thiophene (T) and dithiophene (2T) present in the terpolymers. This property can be varied to control the crystallinity of the terpolymers.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| crystallinity |

Explanation:

After reviewing the previous answer, I realize that the entity "compositions of T and 2T" does not clearly refer to a material property. Therefore, it should not be included in the list of property names.

The only valid property name in the paragraph is "crystallinity", which refers to the degree of structural order in a material.
